bodyV2.markdown:
You can protect your tickets with TicketPlan, a booking refund protection service. This is an optional service that can be added to your ticket order at the time of purchase. 

TicketPlan will provide you with a refund for any unused booking if you need to cancel your booking due to unavoidable circumstances. 

All tickets are non-refundable, so this option will allow a full refund in case of cancellation resulting from accidents and unexpected illnesses. Please read full details on what is covered.

N.B. TicketPlan is not an Insurance Policy

content.name: Can I buy insurance for my tickets?
